item.title: Instagram and TikTok Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a skilled Instagram/TikTok Video Editor who can transform raw video footage into captivating 1-2 minute clips. The ideal candidate will have a strong eye for detail, a good sense of music and timing, and the ability to enhance audio and video quality. You will also be responsible for adding captions, improving audio, and providing voice-overs when necessary.

We have around 10 such videos that need to be edited, captioned and fixed up for Instagram and TikTok.

We will have more content and if this project is successful we are looking to work with the candidate on an on going basis.

Responsibilities:

Edit raw video footage into engaging 1-2 minute clips suitable for Instagram and TikTok.

Add music, captions, and other visual effects to enhance video quality and engagement.

Improve audio quality, including noise reduction and volume leveling.

Provide voice-overs for videos when required.

Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in social media video editing.
Qualifications:

Proven experience as a video editor, specifically for social media platforms like Instagram and TikTok.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar).
Strong understanding of music, sound effects, and voice-over integration.
Ability to add captions and other on-screen text elements effectively.
Excellent attention to detail and creativity.
Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
Ability to meet tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
A portfolio showcasing your previous work, especially social media video content.

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 24, 2024 06:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: UGC Video Content Creator with Australian or English Accent (no editors, we're looking for models) - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a few UGC Content Creators for our marketing agency.

As a UGC Content Creator, you need to follow the script provided to you and record the raw video ad in square format (1080x1080).

The ad should closely follow the provided video script. Attention to detail is crucial to ensure the ad matches the video content accurately.

You only need to replicate the script and the cuts. You do not need to do any of the graphic editing.

This can be completed in an hour or two.

Requirements
- Portfolio of previous work
- Quick turnaround time
- Proficient in English

Apply and I shoot you a message with the script and instructions if you qualify.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 24, 2024 06:10 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:UGC, Video Production
Skills: UGC, Video Production
Country: AUS
click to apply

item.title: Premade asset creation to enhance instagram reels - Upwork
item.description:
I create reels for my business at the following instagram. https://www.instagram.com/theoctagonoracle/
I'm looking to increase the professional look/feel of the reels through better graphic design including fonts changes, caption font changes, caption animation improvements, caption design improvements, improvements to the cover, animations, transitions, etc. I work in adobe premier pro so will need the animations/fonts and such to work in there easily.
My brand colors are the green you can see in the reels along with black. Please give specific details regarding what premade assets you would create to improve all of this in your proposal.


Posted On: June 24, 2024 05:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Animation, Graphic Design, Instagram
Skills: Video Editing, Animation, Graphic Design, Instagram
Country: United States
click to apply
